items.text_for_match: Meet the former Arsenal chief who now runs Spurs BBC Sport's senior football correspondent Sami Mokbel takes an in-depth look at Vinai Venkatesham, the former Arsenal managing director who is the new power broker at Spurs. items.ja: The legend of El Loco - 30 years since the scorpion kick
items.en: The legend of El Loco - 30 years since the scorpion kick
items.text_for_match: The legend of El Loco - 30 years since the scorpion kick Thirty years ago, Rene Higuita wrote his name into folklore with a scorpion-kick save for Colombia against England at Wembley. Thirty years ago, Rene Higuita wrote his name into folklore with a scorpion-kick save for Colombia against England at Wembley.
